name: Google Hangouts - Dark Style
description:
This restyles the Google Hangouts interface to be dark with grey highlights similar to the DeepDark style. This is for the hangouts web page or the gmail hangouts sidebar. This is NOT for the chrome webextension (add-on).

The Google Bar - Dark Style theme by Devo (https://userstyles.org/styles/120351/google-bar-dark-style) optionally can be applied alongside in order to style the top Google bar interface.
additional_info:
Credit to Guy Stevens for some base elements of the hangouts theming (https://userstyles.org/styles/119604/hangouts-black-v2-0).

Best combined with:
FT DeepDark add-on by steva (Stefano Roselli) (Firefox Only) https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/ft-deepdark/

Dark Fusion - Google by DeathTBO - https://userstyles.org/styles/112421/dark-fusion-google

DeepDark Theme by actualmanx (Chrome only) https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/deep-dark/eeffcpnmcmfdfnaadpnkldhkcjjiihcf

DeepDark Scroll Bars extension by actualmanx (Chrome only) https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/deep-dark-scrollbars/feeaojjpfjaggengmoigjlckepbmkane

5/14/2018 - Darkened message list background to make it blend in with built in Gmail dark theme.
2/10/2017 - New group hover and new group name text input color fixed.
1/26/2017 - Removed google contacts support. Now Hangouts only.
8/26/2016 - Fix last update and also remove initial background before hover for hangouts contact list first entry.
8/22/2016 - Unread message header contact name text now lighter.
8/21/2016 - Themed background for sending picture after image is selected and number of participants superscript at top of message while not in focus.
8/11/2016 - Darkened text for "You are in this call" message text during video call.
8/8/2016 - Themed dialogs that pop up when no connection is available. Also colored background of status when another person is typing in a hangouts conversation (thanks Devo).
7/23/2016 - Themed some missing call list items in Hangouts.
6/9/2016 - Themed new contact popup thanks to Devo.
6/3/2016 - Fixed background of status in hangouts message box which states "user isn't on Hangouts right now. he'll/she'll see your messages later
4/5/2016 - Fixed background color while loading page, fixed hangouts sms icon (thanks Devo).
12/19/2015 - Added a couple of missed icon inversions.
12/8/2015 - Unread message text color now set to white.
12/6/2015 - Left side panel selected group indicator now uses new contact button color.
12/3/2015 - Added option for new contact button color and new contact button hover color.
11/25/2015 - Shifted left panel down a bit and main panel down to line up with each other. Inverted missed icon for adding frequent contact. Changed default accent colors.
11/18/2015 - Lightened the placeholder text inside input boxes. Tweaked input box background color for new contact edit info popup to match camouflaged style of default colors.
11/14/2015 - Inverted a couple more missed icons in hangouts message header. Themed message settings and group hangouts member listing/add person sections. Lightened some contact search text elements. Darkened stickers background during selection. Themed the hangouts page slideout menu, invites section, and settings section.
11/13/2015 - Inverted a couple more missed icons in group chat hangouts message, also inverted disabled notifications icon. Modified background color of new contact name in new message recipients list.
11/8/2015 - Minor updates. Inverted some missed icons. Inverted some missed new contact info edit popup. Darkened some hangouts video call list/search items.
11/7/2015 - Darkened some Google Plus contact popup items. Added selection for dark or light sort/hangouts icon in the contacts header.
11/6/2015 - Fix for hangouts contacts and unread text color.
11/5/2015 - Initial Release.

discussions.name: I'd love it to be dark, but the main screen is still white!
